Articles.Content:
**Constellation Essentials**

Originally by BahamutoD & CXAerospace

Now maintained by \_Augustus\_ & Dragon01

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/coZoW)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/NsGOk)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/okmikvnYfgw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Required Mods** 

\*[Procedural Fairings](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/39512-0-90-Procedural-Fairings-3-11-manual-shape-controls-%28December-17%29)

\*[Habitat Pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64442-0-23-5-Habitat-Pack-v0-4)

\*[Procedural Parts](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106975-0-90-Procedural-Parts-Parts-the-way-you-want-em-v1-0-Jan-11)

\*[American Pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products)

**Recommended Mods (Stock)**

\*[Spice Launch System](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112771-Spice-Launch-System-SLS) ([stock config here](http://www.filedropper.com/part_1)) for an Ares I 1st stage or SLS SRBs

\*[UbioZur Welding Continued](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107273) for reducing the part count on stuff

**Recommended Mods (Realism Overhaul)**

\*[CMES](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64993-0-90-Chaka-Monkey-Exploration-Odyssey-0-27-1-EFT-1-Commemorative-Edition) for 100% accurate Orion, Ares, and hab modules

\*[Spice Launch System](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112771-Spice-Launch-System-SLS) for Ares I 1st stage or SLS SRBs

 ***DOWNLOAD REMOVED BY MODERATION TEAM PER LICENSING LAWS.***

So I wanted to play with BahamutoD's Constellation parts, but fix up a couple things along the way. Dragon01 also found CXAerospace's beautiful parts and we decided to combine these and find a modeller so we can finish this.

Please note, by the way, that CXAerospace released his parts' sources as because can't work on them anymore. His license on the front page is not the license for the source files.

This mod is the result.

Currently includes:

-Most Copernicus MTV parts except fuel tanks

-MTV fairings

-MAV fuel tanks and engines

> 
> **MAV**
> 
> -Finish the MAV parts
> 
> **Copernicus**
> 
>  -Add LOX injection mode to standard BNTR
> 
> -Add fuel tanks
> 
> **Asimov + Kepler**
> 
>  -frame
> 
>  -legs

[**BahamutoD's Constellation Essentials Original Thread**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76841-%28RSS-RO%29-Constellation-Essentials-v1-3-1-Trusses-Engines-Adapters-%28Apr21%29)

[**CXAerospace Original Thread**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92523-WIP-CxAerospace-Aeroshells-and-Lander-Chassis-%28Source-Files-Released%29)

[**License**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0/)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-16T21:51:57Z" title="03/16/2015 09:51  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 16, 2015</time> by DuoDex**
It appears to be a compilation of patches provided in the old thread. Is this correct, or am I missing something?

> 
> It appears to be a compilation of patches provided in the old thread. Is this correct, or am I missing something?

I made the 1.3 parts stock-sized as well. Also you no longer require a separate download for the RO version, a ModuleManager thing that changes their size has been implemented.

Ah, nice work! I guess I'll be using these in my RSS RealismOverhaul game.

(By the way, sorry to be sort of unrelated, but I noticed in your Google Docs mod page that your KopernicusTech mods are no longer there. Are you no longer working on them? Please don't tell me that... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) (I really like your KopernicusTech mods! Especially OuterPlanetsPlus!))

> 
> Ah, nice work! I guess I'll be using these in my RSS RealismOverhaul game.
> (By the way, sorry to be sort of unrelated, but I noticed in your Google Docs mod page that your KopernicusTech mods are no longer there. Are you no longer working on them? Please don't tell me that... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) (I really like your KopernicusTech mods! Especially OuterPlanetsPlus!))

Kirius is now abandoned, and OuterPlanetsPlus needs to be redone.

Also in the next update I'm currently in the process of obtaining permission from BobCat to use his Orion and Altair.

Dragon01 is also going to help model the MTVs and Ares so we can have as few dependencies as possible.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-15T19:59:14Z" title="03/15/2015 07:59  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 15, 2015</time> by \_Augustus\_**
So are you adding anything to this? Or do you just want to have your name on it so you can say you maintain a mod? It's not like the old one no longer works or anything.

> 
> So are you adding anything to this? Or do you just want to have your name on it so you can say you maintain a mod? It's not like the old one no longer works or anything.

Dragon01 and I are adding a lot for the next update.

> 
> Dragon01 and I are adding a lot for the next update.

What are you adding? And why not make it a separate mod if the old one still works?

> 
> What are you adding? And why not make it a separate mod if the old one still works?

We're adding:

MTV fairings

Ares rockets, Orion, and Altair by BobCat

And possibly fuel tanks for the Copernicus!

So it's just several functioning mods being bundled? I still don't see why you don't just make a new mod for it, instead of using parts from mods that still work. If the mods had stopped being compatible, it would be a different story.

> 
> So it's just several functioning mods being bundled? I still don't see why you don't just make a new mod for it, instead of using parts from mods that still work. If the mods had stopped being compatible, it would be a different story.

We've contacted maccollo about re-modeling the Ares parts.

> 
> We've contacted maccollo about re-modeling the Ares parts.

You didn't answer my question. Why not just make a new mod, instead of bundling old mods that still work?

> 
> You didn't answer my question. Why not just make a new mod, instead of bundling old mods that still work?

That's what I'm wondering too. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
It's the same has it was, What did you change ?
1.4 is out! We've added some MAV parts and fairings for the MTVs.

It would be awesome if the [lander frame that BahamutoD was working on](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76841-%28RSS-RO%29-Constellation-Essentials-v1-3-1-Trusses-Engines-Adapters-%28Apr21%29?p=1173538&viewfull=1#post1173538) made a reappearance here...

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/6kNBS)

> 
> It would be awesome if the [lander frame that BahamutoD was working on](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76841-%28RSS-RO%29-Constellation-Essentials-v1-3-1-Trusses-Engines-Adapters-%28Apr21%29?p=1173538&viewfull=1#post1173538) made a reappearance here...
> [http://imgur.com/a/6kNBS](http://imgur.com/a/6kNBS)

We made our own better and larger version.

> 
> 1.4 is out! We've added some MAV parts and fairings for the MTVs.

[This feels familiar.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101335-%280-25%29-Bargain-Rocket-Parts-v-1-5)

I trust you have the original author's blessing this time?

Also, straight up ignoring criticism and questions does not make them go away ![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif)

...And given the original author was just online a couple of days ago, I too would be curious if this outright rip-off of someone else's work was blessed.

And yes, there seems to be a pattern evolving.

> 
> And yes, there seems to be a pattern evolving.

Clearly. \_Augustus\_ moved from a mod release every 8.6 days in February to one every 10.6 days in march (so far). One is getting lazy.

I'd like it if you answered my question, the old mods still work perfectly fine, why is there a need to bundle them? BahatmoD is still active on the forums, and updating his mods regularly, so why not make a completely different mod?
Just a reminder to keep it civil and try to avoid asking the same questions over and over again.

This mod is violating a license has it is now, cxg2827 parts ( [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92523-WIP-CxAerospace-Aeroshells-and-Lander-Chassis-%28Source-Files-Released%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92523-WIP-CxAerospace-Aeroshells-and-Lander-Chassis-%28Source-Files-Released%29) )

Hi \_Augustus\_. It's nice to see that you are so enthusiastic, and wanting to take over mods, wanting to improve them and get them playable for the Community again. But please, think a moment about this: You've maintained now a couple of mods by others, and you *gave up on all of them* now. Why? 

You can't even make mods at all, you can't texture, you can't model, you can't write a plugin, so I ask you why you take a mod over like Bargain Rocket Parts or this one now. This one worked, and you just added a bunch of configs from Bahamutos old thread here, and "sell" it now as your brand-new maintained modpack. I have to agree with the others, you just want your name in the mod. 

Listen dude, why don't you just take over one mod and care for it in a proper way? Adding models, which you've made ***yourselves***, or whatever you can all do to improve or refurbish mods. You can see now how the community reacts, and it's worth a minute of thinking how this should continue. Hopefully not like this.

So, get into modding yourselves, make your own mod, but stop taking over mods you can't be able to maintain anyway. This is my opinion, and I think others share my opinion. I don't want to be rude, but really, think about it.
The name besides his is a good example of that IMO.
